pullRequest.title: Add travis-retry to check-links & compatibility check tasks
pullRequest.bodyText:
The check-links & compatibility checks task can see random failures.
This update adds 'travis-retry' which will automatically retry up to 3 times.
Retry documentation is at:
https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/#travis_retry

Functional Changes

[] New map or map update
[] New Feature
[] Feature update or enhancement
[] Feature Removal
[] Code Cleanup or refactor
[x] Configuration Change
[] Problem fix:  
[] Other:   
Testing

commit.message:
Add travis-retry to check-links build task

The check-links task sees random failures pretty frequently
This update adds 'travis-retry' which will automatically
retry up to 3 times.

Retry documentation is at:
https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/#travis_retry
Add travis retry to compatibility checks in case we get a failure downloading an XML

nodes.bodyText: AFAIK "skip" is just a placeholder term to skip the install task, so it doesn't make sense to keep it here
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ sudo: false
 language: java
 jdk: openjdk11
 cache: { directories: [ ".gradle", "~/.gradle/caches" ] }
-install: skip
+install: skip travis_retry
